github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.name: Default
github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.text: Use this to generate commit messages based on the changes made in the code.
github.copilot.chat.commitMessageGenerat.prompt: Generate a concise and descriptive commit message for the changes made in the code.
